segments.text: Hey , that ’ s a very nice hairdo you ’ re wearing !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh you ’ re exaggerating . I ’ m never really good at making hairdo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You did it yourself ? Wow , you are good !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for saying so , but my husband thinks otherwise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He ’ s just got no idea of how good you are .
segments.speaker: S1
